1.18.2.1.18.2-1.0.1.0:
Updated to 1.18.2
Added supernovas
Supernovas affect the night light levels, while they are visible in the sky. However, they do not affect the vanilla daylight sensors, due to how Mojang implemented them. That being said, they affect the inverted daylight sensors.
Added shooting stars
Added (server) config options for supernovas and shooting stars
